name: Create your collection
description: We’ve created an NFT Generator that you can use to generate your collection. Make sure to have your layers and attributes ready.

name: Add Your NFTs
description: The output JSON file from the NFT-Generator, your Collection Logo, and Banner must be uploaded to the create section

name: Sell Your NFTs
description: Once you’ve completed all the steps and submitted your NFT Collection, a new collection page will be generated where your community can mint. It’s that simple!
